item.title: Deploy Fastapi to Heroku
item.author: Author
item.description: run.py 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 from fastapi import FastAPI app = FastAPI() @app.get("/") async def root(): return {"message": "Hello World"} Procfile 1 web: gunicorn -w 4 -k uvicorn.workers.UvicornWorker run:app requirements.txt 1 2 3 fastapi gunicorn uvicorn
